name: replay
description: Replays a HTTP conversation capturing the new responses obtained

name: sensitive-json
display-name: Detector of sensitive data in JSON

description: launch a local proxy and intercept request / responses a perform some actions

name: openapiv2-lint

author: BBVA Labs Security
